title: 3: GAYS AND SLOOTS
description:
Have you ever felt your partner might be gay? Hiding their sexuality? Have you ever had a guy ask you to %$#! in their mouth? Ever had your weed laced unknowingly and freaked TF out!? In this week's episode, Sofia is joined by her GBF John. They discuss some raw experiences (pun intended) of being a part of the LBGTQ+ Community. John reveals his coming out story, some raunchy uncommon kinky sex app encounters, how to spot clues if you think your partner may be hiding their sexuality, and many other matters.

Follow Sofia on Instagram and Twitter @SofiaFranklyn
Find merch HERE: https://sofiafranklyn.com/

Calm: CALM.COM/SOFIA
